description: Episode number 2 of Series "This life". 'Fantasy football' (dir. Audrey Cooke): Miles is bending over backwards to try and make it up to everyone for his ex-girl friend's behaviour. Strapped for cash, Anna embarks on 'Operation pricktease' to procure more work. Miles makes contact with his father while waiting for the results of Delilah's HIV test. Egg and Milly are having relationship problems. 'Family outing' (dir. Audrey Cooke): Egg prepares for a new career and Milly is feeling the strain. Miles is struggling to quit smoking cold turkey and Warren is forced to tell Kira about his sexuality when she finds him at a gay haunt. Warren's brother makes a surprise visit. 'Brief encounter' (dir. Audrey Cooke): Anna is still frustrated at her lack of work and wonders whether it's something to do with her, Warren's frustrated at Kira's meddling in his personal life. Egg tries to discuss his sex life with Miles, with little success, and Anna and Jo share drinks and a one night stand after work, causing problems in the workplace. 'Cheap thrills' (dir. Nigel Douglas): Things are still volatile between Jo and Anna and it reaches a head at Hooperman's party. Egg is making progress on his first novel, "Deadly wishes", but does not have much success at his first part time job. Jerry, Egg's father turns up with shocking news that hits home for Milly and Egg.
